episodes.title: "I Was In A Sex Cult" with Magda Kay
episodes.description: She was in a sex cult on a remote island for 4 years.... This week Dustin welcomes Intimacy Expert & Personal Coach, Magda Kay to the show. Magda was looking for sexual healing about a decade ago and suddenly found herself in a sex cult on a remote island with a couple hundred other people. She would spend the next 4 years of her life there. Magda tells Dustin about everything she experienced while being a part of the cult including sex parties, group sex, threesomes, non monogamy, and "Temple Nights." She also explains in depth how most of the upper leadership of this cult were men who practiced a tantric form of sex that included non ejaculation and how instead of ejaculating, they redirected the energy of their orgasms throughout their whole body. Magda opens up about how the cult came to an end, how ultimately she was able to mend her traumas, get the sexual healing she was looking for, and take everything positive from the experience to apply it to her work helping others find intimacy and connection with themselves and with their partners. Get ready to go inside a sex cult, but be prepared to for an episode that's not quite what you think it is.... 👀 Welcome to Episode 130: "I Was In A Sex Cult" with Magda Kay Watch the video version of the show on YouTube YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIuCkOl_XummXVdu1t3XOuQ Follow Magda Kay Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/magdakayofficial (@magdakayofficial) Check out Magda Kay on YouTube YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@MagdaKay Buy Magda's book 'No More Faking It' https://www.amazon.com/No-More-Faking-pleasure-fulfillment/dp/B0C2S6Q9VM/ref=sr_1_1?crid=786EZ5OAGYCT&dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.I50QiysLIZVVkIb8b6RvGyFUtFL8q18DORq7X8eDpxg.xxIj7XGc_PBoUVUpnT_qO2He8zm37-Q9hIriudMq4gY&dib_tag=se&keywords=magda+kay+no+more+faking+it&qid=1721201276&sprefix=magda+kay%2Caps%2C90&sr=8-1 Work with Magda Kay https://magdakay.com Follow the show Instagram: https://instagram.com/sexparty.fm (@sexparty.fm) Twitter: https://twitter.com/sexpartyfm (@sexpartyfm) Follow Dustin Instagram: https://instagram.com/dustinrybka (@dustinrybka) Twitter: https://twitter.com/dustinrybka (@dustinrybka) Sex Party with Dustin Rybka
